work.title: Vice President
work.description: Started as Technical Business Analyst, grew into Front-End Engineer (Tesla Award for Innovation), now VP managing 12 engineers across 2 global squads. Led zero-to-one UI development for financial planning apps. Currently lead engineering strategy for 5 client-facing apps across Morgan Stanley Online & E*TRADE. Pitched and launched a unified planning platform saving $2M+. Now leading firm-wide AI developer enablement & education via bootcamps and workshops. OpenAI Hackathon finalist with 'Nevernote' (Whisper, Langchain, GPT).

work.title: Founder & CEO
work.description: Founded and built a B2B food truck platform end-to-end using Flutter, Dart, GraphQL, Firebase, and GCP. Developed AI advisor 'Garnish' with OpenAI's Responses API and RAG for intelligent vendor recommendations. Led remote cross-functional team of 5. Secured contracts with 3 industry vendors for discounted goods/services. Currently serving 150+ food trucks across the US.

work.title: Founder & CTO
work.description: Led technical strategy for algorithmic crypto trading platform using Java, React, and AWS. Grew AUM to $750K in 18 months through automated arbitrage trading.
